name: Hit Boxes - Blow Away Objects
description:
Use your character's actions to drop boxes with numbers and aim for a high score.

You can play by competing for two results, TIME (play time) and SCORE (points obtained by dropping boxes).

WASD or ↑←↓→: Move

G: Left punch *Recommended for hitting SWITCH

H: Right punch *Recommended for hitting SWITCH

J: Jump

K: Kick *Recommended for blowing away objects

U: Roll

L: Appeal *Recommended to show off your leeway

*Since this game released the HIT BOXES stage of the mobile app "OurCasualBattlefield", the UI (buttons and sticks) for smartphones is displayed, but please ignore it.

Here, the specification has been modified so that it can be played with a keyboard.

Mobile is more fun, so if you like it, please enjoy the mobile app version :)

* Acquired coins are required to unlock hidden content at the shop (mobile app version only).

*Some of the sounds use material from Yufuruka.
